data.md:MetaData: (Supplement S2) Absolute abundances of benthic foraminifers from Alvin dive ALV_3709-3712_22
Push cores had a inner diameter of 6.9 cm and were taken Alvin dives 3709 to 3712, centered on ODP site 996, at the Blake Ridge diapir.
Late Holocene foraminifera of Blake Ridge diapir: Assemblage variation and stable-isotope record in gas-hydrate bearing sediments
